body_html: I found the underlying issue. CUDA 8 defines __float2half_rn as returning an unsigned short rather than a __half as CUDA 9 does. I issued a second PR to Eigen to replace __float2half_rn with __float2half (which returns a __half in both 8 and 9). Once that is accepted, I'll update this PR with the correct Eigen revision.
